articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The ceasefire will run from 8 May until 11 May, the Kremlin says.
articles.title: Putin announces three-day Ukraine ceasefire from 8 May

articles.description: The 14-year-old is sentenced for attempted murder after attacking two teachers and a pupil.
articles.title: Ammanford: Teen girl who stabbed teachers sentenced to 15 years

articles.description: A teenager admits the manslaughter of Harvey Willgoose at a school in Sheffield on 3 February.
articles.title: Boy admits stabbing Harvey Willgoose to death at Sheffield school

articles.description: A review into the BBC's workplace culture was commissioned in the wake of allegations against Huw Edwards.
articles.title: Some BBC stars behave unacceptably, report says

articles.description: The government says it will save parents £50 a year, but retailers say it could end up costing more.
articles.title: School uniforms to change for four million pupils under plans

articles.description: The closed-door meeting will begin in the Sistine Chapel and will involve some 135 cardinals from across the world.
articles.title: Conclave to elect new pope to begin on 7 May, Vatican says

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Parents are being "misled" by marketing from leading baby food companies, experts tell BBC.
articles.title: Baby food pouches low in key nutrients, lab testing finds

articles.description: Pay review bodies recommend increases for teachers and NHS workers above the 2.8% the government has budgeted for.
articles.title: Ministers face above projected teacher and NHS pay deals

articles.description: Kai-Ji Adam Lo, a 30-year-old resident of the city, is charged with several counts of second degree murder.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Video emerged of a 2023 gig appearing to show a band member saying: "The only good Tory is a dead Tory."
articles.title: Kneecap: Daughter of murdered MP Sir David Amess calls for apology
